entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Intellisense][Drawing] Add BrushDesignTypeConverter #17636
  • .NET MAUI, Entry Size(Heighr) is Error. #17635
  • .NET MAUI, set Entry style error #17634
  • Will `PointerPressed` be supported as a visual state in .NET 8? #17632
  • Update Border in our templates to have a background set #17631
  • Issue with implicit vs explicit Shell Routing #17629
  • [iOS] Crash in production: .NET ThreadPool Worker EXC_BAD_ACCESS KERN_INVALID_ADDRESS #17626
  • MSAL - PublicClientApplication - GetAccountsAsync() doesn't return any Accounts in windows maui #17623
  • MAUI Slider height property is not setting the height of it #17622
  • Xaml hot reload not working on VS Mac Could not resolve type with token 01000062 from typeref (expected class 'System.AppDomain' #17615
  • "Codesign" exited with code 1 issue when try to build iOS app using visual studio 2022 for mac. #17612

Closed

  • [Windows] Border with rounded corners does not work well #17500
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Border's corner radius applied to child's top left corner in Windows, iOS and MacCatalyst #16444
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • [Windows] Border content is not correctly clipping and aligning #17109
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Visual Studio 17.7.0 Pre2 / Dotnet 8 8.0.100-preview.5.23303.2 / MAUI 8.0.0-preview.5.8529 build error XAGJS7023 for Android #15947
  • [8.0.100-rc.1.23455.8] dotnet build for windows fails with error NETSDK1083: The specified RuntimeIdentifier "win10-x64" is not recognized #17330
    .NET 8 GA
  • A11y_.NET Core MAUI_Recipe App_Edit Recipe_Screenreader : The "Review" Label is not announced by Narrator and NVDA Screenreader #15663
    .NET 8 GA
  • A11y_.NET Core_MAUI_Recipe App_Your Recipe_Keyboard : The "More options" button is not accessible by keyboard. #15664
    .NET 8 GA
  • Provide Static MauiContextAccessor #16759
    Under Consideration
  • [regression/8.0.0] [Android] Fix ToolbarUpdatesCorrectlyWhenSwappingMainPageWithAlreadyUsedPage #17444
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.3.8149] Crash when using NavigationPage.TitleView (Java.Lang.IllegalStateException: The specified child already has a parent) #16499
    .NET 8 GA
  • Error when using Int32 as a resource for the parameter for <RoundRectangle CornerRadius=""> #16327
    Backlog
  • [regression/8.0.0] MAUI crashing on CarouselView render/remove, flyout menu #17396
    .NET 8 GA
  • How do I programmatically "restart" an Android app in.Net maui? #17625
  • No Longer Able to Create MapSpan in XAML #17383
    Backlog
  • [MAUI7] Label control with TextType set to Html, does not change the Text Color. #17439
  • [VSCode][MAUI]The App hang after pulling down the RefreshView C2 page on iOS and My Mac target. #17394
  • not running #17454
  • Binding doesn't update control property after manual update #17382
    Backlog
  • Image taken by Binding and IValueConverter is not shown #17272
  • CarouselView does not work at all #17416
  • .NET MAUI does not work with Android 13 Permissions.RequestAsync<Permissions.Camera>(); When One Time Denied From Application #17580
  • [regression/8.0.0] [Android] Fix RemoveCurrentPageAndThenReAddDoesntCrash #17589
  • dotnet Publish error (MaterialDesignColor) #17600

PullRequests

Created

  • Make ALL template warnings show up as test errors (not just C# warnings), and produce more diagnostic artifacts #17637
    area/templates 📄
  • Add border visual tests #17633
  • Bump the xunit group with 3 updates #17619
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Merged

  • [Windows] Fixes border content clipping #17310
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Remove reference to concrete native host app #16803
    area/hosting 🧩, community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
  • Reenable WinUI Device Tests parallel running #17613
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Recreate Details Fragment, if its been destroyed #17604
    .NET 8 GA
  • Document return values for animation extensions #17627
  • Remove Previous TitleView from Toolbar #17353
    .NET 8 GA
  • [X] Double cast for OnPlat in StaticResource #17545
    area/Xaml </>
  • try fix #17396 #17505
    .NET 8 GA
  • [android] update AOT profile for .NET 8.0.100-rc.2.23468.1 #17624
  • Update SkiaSharp to the latest stable version (2.88.6) #17558
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #17595
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net7.0] Backport Legacy Control Gallery #17434
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Recreate the Navigation Host If It's been Destroyed #17594
    .NET 8 GA

Updated

  • Fixed Android's Border background to use a Transparent bg if not othe… #17555
    area/controls 🎮, .NET 8 GA
  • Enable .NET 7 <MauiVersion> to work in .NET 8 SDK projects #17409
    .NET 8 GA
  • Fix OnPlatform + Setter when no match for current platform #17061
    area/Xaml </>, Under Consideration
  • If NavigationRenderer is Disposed don't UpdateFrames #17544
  • [Windows] Fix tab colors not updating on add/remove #17591
    platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢, area/desktop 🖥️, .NET 8 + Servicing
  • [Android] Fix ScrollView filling layouts #17243
    area/layout 🔲, platform/android 🤖, layout-scrollview, Under Consideration
  • [iOS] Fix downscaled images not occupying correct space #17120
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area/image :framed_picture:, .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Make Android respect power saving/disabled animations #17287
    .NET 8 GA
  • IsNullOrEmpty for Paint not returning true if Colors are not set #15668
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale, .NET 8 GA
  • Update Flyout when Shell.FlyoutContent changes #17359
    area/shell 🐢, partner/hot-reload-xaml, .NET 8 GA
  • (Windows) ImageButton contents now explicitly stretches #17159
    platform/windows 🪟, area/image :framed_picture:, area/controls 🎮, control-button, stale, Under Consideration
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp from 4.5.0 to 4.7.0 #16888
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget, stale, Under Consideration
  • Implement touch interception for layouts on Android #13725
    area/layout 🔲, s/pr-needs-author-input, Under Consideration
  • iOS Keyboard Scrolling Improvements and UITests #16201
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, Under Consideration
  • Bump the androidx group with 14 updates #17401
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 1 update #17509
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [net8.0] Try a coherent updated of all rc2 versions #17583
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [iOS] Clear BindingContext when cell is queued for reuse #14619
    community ✨, Under Consideration
